item.title: Master Caution/Warning Systems – Master CAUTION Lights (Pilot’s Glare Shield)

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided master caution aural system and all discrete caution lights are operative.

note.para: The Amber Discrete Caution Lights that must be operative are located on the forward instrument panel:
The Amber Discrete Caution Lights that must be operative are located on the forward instrument panel:

placard.para: Placard affected Master CAUTION Light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
